scripts.test: cd server && npm run test && cd ../client && npm run test
scripts.install:all: npm i && cd server && npm i && cd ../client && npm i
scripts.cypress: concurrently "npm run server:test" "npm run client" "cd client && npm run cypress"
scripts.lint: concurrently "cd server && npm run lint" "cd client && npm run lint"
scripts.lint:fix: concurrently "cd server && npm run lint:fix" "cd client && npm run lint:fix"
